crystal.title: CrystalPrivacy
crystal.config.disable_telemetry.tooltip: Disable sending telemetry data to Mojang
crystal.config.verbose.tooltip: Verbose logging, NPE is usually silent
crystal.config.server_toasts.tooltip: Enable toasts notifying whether the server modifies messages or not
crystal.config.fake_ban.tooltip: Make the game think you're banned, because why not
crystal.config.signing_mode.tooltip: Set the signing mode for messages & keypairs
crystal.config.chat_indicator.tooltip: Change how modified or unsafe messages appear
crystal.warning.server_signing: Uh, oh. It looks like this server does not accept unsigned messages. To chat in this server, simply set the signing mode to "SIGN" in the settings. Don't forget to change it back later though!
crystal.warning.server_key: Hmm, it looks like this server enforces secure profiles. They won't let us in without a key! To join this server, simply set the signing mode to anything but "NO_KEY" in the settings. Don't forget to change it back later though!
crystal.modified_chat.toast: It looks like this server disables player reporting. Nice!
crystal.unmodified_chat.toast: Hmm, it looks like this server has player reporting enabled... Are you sure you want to keep playing?
